column2: 变量重定义variable redefined
函数重定义function redefined
使用了未定义左值undefined left-val is used
使用了未定义函数undefined function is used
返回值不合法invalid return(return an integer in void function...)
以非正整数初始化数组大小initiate array size isn't positive integer
数组索引维度超出array index dimension out of size
索引越界index out of bound(each dimension)
类型转换错误cast error (e.g. void can't be cast to integer)
定义数组使用了动态大小initiate array size with dynamic variable
不能对常量赋值try to modify a const variable
数组索引不是整数index of array isn't integer
并非数组(如a[0]而a不是数组)not an array(like using a[0]
column3: while a is just an integer)

column2: 操作数为void类型operating void variable(e.g. integet+void)
主函数必须返回int main function should return int
用非常量初始化常量initiate const variable with non-const variable
对float类型用取余运算modulo(%) can't be used for float
没有main函数报错no main function warning
隐式类型转换警告implicit cast warning(e.g int a = 1.0)
变量未使用警告variable wasn't used
返回值不是void的函数没有返回a non-void function has no return statement
太多初始化值too many initializer
单目运算符只能用于整型和浮点型unary can only be used for integer/float
